package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Nano editor
package-manager.description: nano is a small, free and friendly editor which aims to replace Pico, the default editor included in the non-free Pine package. Rather than just copying Pico's look and feel, nano also implements some missing (or disabled by default) features in Pico, such as "search and replace" and "go to line number".

item.para: Update gettext dependency from 0.17 to 0.18.1.1
Update ncurses dependency from 5.6 to 5.7

Apply patch for CVE-2010-1160 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2010-1160). GNU nano does not verify whether a file has been changed before it is overwritten in a file-save operation, which allows local user-assisted attackers to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on an attacker-owned file that is being edited by the victim.

Apply patch for CVE-2010-1161 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2010-1161). Race condition in GNU nano, when run by root to edit a file that is not owned by root, allows local user-assisted attackers to change the ownership of arbitrary files via vectors related to the creation of backup files.
